definition: any of several breeds of dog used for hunting typically having large drooping ears, pursue or chase relentlessly
details:
noun
- any of several breeds of dog used for hunting typically having large drooping ears
= synonyms: hound dog
- someone who is morally reprehensible
= synonyms: dog, heel, bounder, cad, blackguard
verb
- pursue or chase relentlessly
= synonyms: hunt, trace
